means: 生育，生产( inbreed的现在分词 )

word_mean: 同系交配，近亲交配，近交
又称“近亲交配”。亲缘关系较近的个体之间的交配。
亲缘关系极为相近的个体之间或遗传组成极相似的个体之间的交配方式。
有亲缘关系的个体间的交配。

sentence.Network_en: In the 19th century, inbreeding nearly led to the extinction of the royal family.
sentence.Network_cn: 19世纪，近亲婚配几乎导致皇室宗族灭绝。

sentence.Network_en: The main aim of inbreeding is to standardise, to fix desirable inherited characteristics and to dispel undesirable ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 同系交配的主要目的就是实现标准化，保持理想的遗传特性，并消除不良的特性。

sentence.Network_en: Endodeme is a deme composed of predominantly closely inbreeding but dioecious individuals.
sentence.Network_cn: 同系同群种是由近亲繁育占优势,但雌雄异株的个体组成的同群种.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ②系统交配（line breeding）③近亲交配（inbreeding） ...-
血系繁殖(linebreeding)、近亲繁殖（inbreeding）、远缘繁殖（outcrossing）犬类的基因库很大。想一想所有的犬种就会明白这一点。每一个犬种都是.
...近交编辑近交(inbreeding)是亲缘关系相近个体间杂交(亦称近亲交配)近亲交配按亲缘远近的程度一般可分为(*全同胞(full-sib))同父母的后代，*半同胞(half-sib)(同父.
inbred 近亲交配inbreeding 近〔亲〕交〔配〕，同系交配inbreeding depression 近交退化，自交退化

list.abs: 亲缘系数(relationship coefficient,r)是两个个体从一个共同祖先获得一个相同基因的概率。近交系数(inbreeding coefficient)定义为一个个体在一个给定的位点从其父母.
inbred 近亲交配inbreeding coefficient 近亲系数incapacity 无能
inbreeding depression 近交衰退inbreeding population 近交群体incentive 诱惑力
1引言近交衰退(inbreeding depression)是指由于近交(自交和亲缘个体间的异交)导致后代适合度下降的现象(CharlesworthCharle.
inbreeding coefficient 近交系数inbreeding depression 近交退化inbreeding population 近交群体

entry.def: Inbreeding is the repeated breeding of closely related animals or people.

example.ex: In the 19th century, inbreeding nearly led to the extinction of the royal family.
example.tran: 19 世纪,近亲婚配几乎导致皇室宗族灭绝。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of mating closely related individuals

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The solution is that we have to take inbreeding into account.
